Yes Legacy is my char.  I just haven't written his bio yet.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Narrator" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Is Legacy your character? Because I really don't think that 
people would go for having the whole thing revolve around your one 
character. Also, I really don't think that will solve anything. It'll 
be the same situation, only we'll be in the future...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: dewboy30816 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Friday, January 25, 2002 3:36 PM
>   Subject: Sequel Suggestions
> 
> 
>   I think if we make a sequel it should involve Legacy.  You all 
know my 
>   first suggestion, here's my second:
> 
>   Legacy dumps the poison, but it has a wierd affect on the nitrogen 
in 
>   our atmosphere.  Most of it becomes Latent, but some of it 
interacts 
>   with our bots sending them into stasis until a decade in the 
future 
>   (our future 2012 A.D.) so the story of the continent of Atlantis 
being 
>   destroyed in a day and a night was really the story of a couple of 
>   bots being put into stasis lock for a few million years and Plato 
just 
>   left off a couple of zeros because he didn't believe the Earth 
could 
>   be that old when we think a zero got added in making it 10,000 
instead 
>   of 1000 years.  But then they wake up in the near future and start 
>   slaggin' again.
> 
>
